iati-activity.title: PUBLIC SERV REFORM AND INSTITU
iati-activity.description: Government leadership and coordination strengthened; Short-term measures implemented to address pressing capacity gaps; Key institutions supported to carry out their functions efficiently; long-term strategy in place for an effective public service.

iati-activity.title: Early Warning Systems
iati-activity.description: This project will invest in strengthening current systems to lead to a fully operational EWS for the Gambia at the institutional level which can in turn serve local communities particularly in remote and vulnerable regions.
